code: @Override public void readFrom(StreamInput in) throws IOException {     super.readFrom(in).     recoveryId = in.readLong().     shardId = ShardId.readShardId(in).     snapshotFiles = new Store.MetadataSnapshot(in).     totalTranslogOps = in.readVInt(). }

@Override public void writeTo(StreamOutput out) throws IOException {     super.writeTo(out).     out.writeLong(recoveryId).     shardId.writeTo(out).     snapshotFiles.writeTo(out).     out.writeVInt(totalTranslogOps). }
